ygData.subject: Heritrix takes forever to Pause
ygData.msgSnippet: We have been having some major problems with our current domain crawl - specifically jobs that hang for various reasons. Our workflow is to pause these jobs

Subject: Heritrix takes forever to Pause
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=582247024
From: Colin Rosenthal <csr@...>

We have been having some major problems with our current domain crawl - 
specifically jobs that hang for various reasons. Our workflow is to 
pause these jobs and
then delete the problematic url's from the frontier so that the job can 
finish gracefully. The problem is that it can take DAYS for some of our 
jobs to reach a PAUSED state. Has
anybody else seen similar issues?
regards,
Colin

-- 
Colin Rosenthal PhD
Senior IT Consultant
Royal Danish Library (Aarhus)
